Settings.Name: Enable mod
Settings.Description: Toggle the mod on/off without uninstalling it.

Settings.Name: Debug level
Settings.Description: 0 = no debug, 1 = minimal, 2 = verbose debug logs.

Settings.Name: Always relabel
Settings.Description:
Skip checks to update containers labels;
always regenerate labels even if they are already labeled.

Settings.Name: Search radius (m)
Settings.Description: How far away in meters to look for containers to label (12m = ~40ft).

Settings.Name: Label owned containers
Settings.Description: Label containers owned by others (the ones that show a red highlight).

Settings.Name: Perception check DC
Settings.Description: Fake perception check DC to label a container (0 = always succeed).

Settings.Name: Remove label from opened containers
Settings.Description: Try to remove the label from containers that have been opened in the current session.

Settings.Name: Label containers for all party members
Settings.Description:
Label containers for all party members
(unchecked = only label for the host/active character).

Settings.Name: Capitalize label
Settings.Description: Whether the label should be capitalized.

Settings.Name: Add parentheses
Settings.Description: Whether the label should be enclosed in parentheses.

Settings.Name: Append label
Settings.Description:
Adds the label after the container's name.
(unchecked = adds before the label).

Settings.Name: Simulate controller padding
Settings.Description: Simulate the spacing used in empty labels by the gamepad UI.

Settings.Name: Display number of items
Settings.Description: Display the number of items in the container.

Settings.Name: Display number if empty
Settings.Description: Show the number of items even if the container is empty.

Settings.Name: Ignored items
Settings.Description: List of items to ignore for counting purposes.
